task.title: How to add numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about using the addition feature of the Calculator app.

prereq.p: To succesfully add numbers, you must know what is addition.

result.p: The result from the substraction is displayed.

example.p: You want to add 2 to 3. The equation will look like: 3+2=5. You enter 3. Press plus. Enter 2. Press equals.
The result 5 appears on the screen.
